text:
yeah, I saw a few articles like that.

I reached out to them didn’t tell them how it happened but showed them the video. Fingers crossed that they had enough of a PR problem from the last few people lol
if you pay for everything, you wont have billions in cash laying around
i wonder if the cartoons kids watch these days are as good as what i watched when i was kid
and there was the dreaded after school special that ruined everything
anyone know of a good shopify developer slack channel?

Hey Jon, been reading some of these earlier posts to try and find an answer, but I’m still stuck. Regarding this flex column, I don’t see these within the email modules, is it only allowed for pages? If so, is it possible to have a full width section within an email? Appreciate the help!

ahh sorry guessing it wasn’t clear you were talking about an email.

Emails don’t currently support flex columns.

yes it’s possible to have a full width section in an email but that requires a coded template.
